title: What are the online certification courses available? - Quora

response.answer_text: Online courses are getting popularity in India among young generations. People don’t have much time these days in their fast lifestyle. The biggest benefit of online courses is that it saves time and effort required in travelling to and from the institute in case of offline coaching.  Today most of the institutes are opening online portal for online tutorials. Legal courses, IT, marketing, engineering - there are numbers of different types of online tutorials available from different institutions for degree or diploma or certificate level courses. For an example you can take Robust Legal in Kolkata. They provide online diploma and certification courses on various law topics like International Environmental Law, Wild Life Protection Act, Illegal Immigrants etc.

It is quite interesting to note that India is also emerging as a base for HR certifications. While there was a time when HR certifications were just a choice, Indian organizations have woken up to the benefits of certifications in the field of HR and are seeking HR certified candidates for their HR related roles. So without much ado, here’s a list of five best HR and talent management certifications that are reigning not only in India but also have become popular the world over. 1. HRCI 2.
